Summary: triangular bright red/orange lights; no blinking; looked like circular lights of a taillight of a Cadillac. Moved very fast to NW horizon.
divs: sighting details5 of us sitting outside on our patio watching a fire. my spouse saw it first. it just appeared out of no where. i got up and looked at it. very close in the sky. i knew it was a plane, no lights blinking and not moving. triangular red\orange color lights motionless in sky. i walked away from the fire to get a better look. it took off very fast to the nw horizon. no sound, no blinking lights. but moved very fast.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Kasson
There were no other sightings in Kasson on or around July 8th 2006
